definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: The test applied a new staining method: sample was dyed by Methylene blue firstly, then dyed by KMn04.
sentences.chinese: 染色採用美藍初染後，高錳酸鉀復染的方法。
